roleset.name: cover with grease
roleset.note: GREASE-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: feather (9.9)Hand-corrected by Claire. Adjectival "greasy" added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from grease.01-v)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He greased his hair with Vaseline and practiced looking really mean.

example.name: Metaphorical greasing, idiomatic expression
example.text: Intel knows they are about to get punished again by AMD so they are greasing the skids to get the media hype they need to delude consumers.
example.arg: to get teh media hype they need to delude customers

example.name: Adjectival rel: greasy
example.text: I used a Stila one as it was ok , but slightly greasy
